docs.abstract: The accusations by Gavin de Becker, Mr. Bezos’ longtime security consultant, are the latest twist in a bizarre situation that has also pulled in the largest U.S. tabloid publisher and The Washington Post.
docs.snippet: The accusations by Gavin de Becker, Mr. Bezos’ longtime security consultant, are the latest twist in a bizarre situation that has also pulled in the largest U.S. tabloid publisher and The Washington Post.
docs.lead_paragraph: SEATTLE — Jeff Bezos’ security consultant accused the Saudi government of gaining unauthorized access to the Amazon chief executive’s phone, as part of an effort to harm the world’s richest man.

headline.main: Bezos’ Security Consultant Accuses Saudis of Hacking the Amazon C.E.O.’s Phone
headline.print_headline: Saudis Hacked Bezos’ Phone, Security Expert Claims

docs.abstract: The surprise change would allow the company to tap into the talent pools of two different regions.
docs.snippet: The surprise change would allow the company to tap into the talent pools of two different regions.
docs.lead_paragraph: SEATTLE — After conducting a yearlong search for a second home, Amazon has switched gears and is now finalizing plans to have a total of 50,000 employees in two locations, according to people familiar with the decision-making process.

headline.main: Amazon Plans to Split HQ2 Between Long Island City, N.Y., and Arlington, Va.
headline.print_headline: Amazon’s Pick for Second Home Is Said to Be Two Second Homes

byline.original: By Karen Weise and J. David Goodman

docs.abstract: Getting a big group together this time of year can be a hassle. So spare everyone the endless phone notifications and email threads and try these methods instead.
docs.snippet: Getting a big group together this time of year can be a hassle. So spare everyone the endless phone notifications and email threads and try these methods instead.
docs.lead_paragraph: With the holiday season upon us, our phones will soon explode with messages and calls from friends and family hoping to catch up and make plans.

headline.main: Make Your Friends and Family Less Irksome This Holiday Season
headline.print_headline: We’re Putting the Band Back Together

docs.abstract: Law enforcement authorities searched offices of the management board as part of an investigation into accusations of money laundering and tax evasion.
docs.snippet: Law enforcement authorities searched offices of the management board as part of an investigation into accusations of money laundering and tax evasion.
docs.lead_paragraph: German law enforcement authorities targeted offices of the Deutsche Bank management board Friday as they spent a second day gathering evidence in an investigation into whether the bank helped clients launder money in an offshore tax haven.

headline.main: Deutsche Bank’s Top Management Offices Searched by German Investigators
headline.print_headline: Police Search Deutsche Bank Board Offices

docs.abstract: Investors interpreted comments by Mr. Powell, the Federal Reserve chairman, as an indication that the central bank may be less inclined to continue raising interest rates.
docs.snippet: Investors interpreted comments by Mr. Powell, the Federal Reserve chairman, as an indication that the central bank may be less inclined to continue raising interest rates.
docs.lead_paragraph: With just two words on Wednesday, the Federal Reserve’s chairman sent stocks surging by raising hopes that the central bank might be closer to ending its push to drive up interest rates.

headline.main: Two Words From Fed Chairman Jerome Powell Sent Markets Soaring
headline.print_headline: Markets Soar on Two Words From Fed Chairman

docs.abstract: Holiday gatherings offer a great time to create a multimedia digital archive of interviews with your relatives so they can share their memories with the current — and future — branches of the tree.
docs.snippet: Holiday gatherings offer a great time to create a multimedia digital archive of interviews with your relatives so they can share their memories with the current — and future — branches of the tree.
docs.lead_paragraph: Many people have pieced together their own family tree. But how much do you really know about the early lives of your living relatives, especially those with decades of stories to share?

headline.main: Record and Share Your Family History in 5 Steps
headline.print_headline: Record and Share Family History in 5 Steps

docs.abstract: Under the terms of the deal, Third Point would appoint two new directors and advise the company in selecting a new chief executive.
docs.snippet: Under the terms of the deal, Third Point would appoint two new directors and advise the company in selecting a new chief executive.
docs.lead_paragraph: Campbell Soup Company is on the verge of a truce with an activist hedge fund that had sought to force the sale or restructuring of the nearly 150-year-old food giant, according to two people with knowledge of the talks.

headline.main: Campbell Soup Nears Truce With Activist Hedge Fund
headline.print_headline: Campbell Soup Nears Truce With an Activist Hedge Fund

docs.abstract: Consumer confidence points to open pocketbooks in the short run. Trade tensions, market upheaval and other factors may make the new year less bright.
docs.snippet: Consumer confidence points to open pocketbooks in the short run. Trade tensions, market upheaval and other factors may make the new year less bright.
docs.lead_paragraph: Americans are upbeat about the economy heading into the holiday shopping season. But that good cheer may not last long.

headline.main: Holiday Spending Should Be Strong. And Then?
headline.print_headline: U.S. Consumers Are Upbeat, Though Clouds Are Forming

docs.abstract: Mr. Polman made a series of dramatic changes to the company that makes Lipton tea and Dove soap, as he pushed to make business more socially responsible.
docs.snippet: Mr. Polman made a series of dramatic changes to the company that makes Lipton tea and Dove soap, as he pushed to make business more socially responsible.
docs.lead_paragraph: When Paul Polman was made chief executive of Unilever in 2009, he was regarded as a safe choice to lead the maker of Hellmann’s mayonnaise, Dove soap and Ben & Jerry’s ice cream. A veteran executive from Nestlé and Procter & Gamble, he was known for his fiscal discipline and international experience.

headline.main: Paul Polman, a ‘Crucial Voice’ for Corporate Responsibility, Steps Down as Unilever C.E.O.
headline.print_headline: ‘Crucial Voice’ for Corporate Responsibility Is Stepping Down at Unilever

docs.abstract: The deal, which removes a cloud that had been hanging over airlines in both countries, will allow flights to continue as usual.
docs.snippet: The deal, which removes a cloud that had been hanging over airlines in both countries, will allow flights to continue as usual.
docs.lead_paragraph: The United States and Britain have reached an agreement that removes a cloud that had been hanging over airlines in both countries as Britain’s departure from the European Union approaches.

headline.main: Britain and U.S. Reach Post-Brexit Aviation Agreement
headline.print_headline: Britain and U.S. Strike Post-Brexit Aviation Deal
